1.0.name: wordpress/tripadvisor-shortcode
1.0.description: This plugin allows you to easily insert the Tripadvisor review feed for a hotel or accommodation through the use of a shortcode. The shortcode is best placed in a page or post. You could try using it in a text widget if your theme allows shortcodes in text wdigets but you will need to do a lot of css changes to get it to fit and look reasonable.
